short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Searches for and opens an Asana task in the Chrome Omnibox or as an Alfred workflow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using:

Go to the URL bar ("Chrome Omnibox"), and type 'a', a space, then
search for an Asana task.  You should see them pop up as suggestions.  

Pick one, and your task will be opened in a new tab!

Configuration:

1. Create a new "Personal access token" in Asana at https://app.asana.com/0/my-apps
2. Set up options directly in Chrome | â€¦ | More Tools | Extensions | Opener for Asana | Details | Extension options.
3. Paste in your personal access token.
4. Provide the rest of the configuration and hit 'Save'
